Text:
Thank you! These albums sound INCREDIBLE.

Also, it's worth mentioning that the Tron Legacy vinyl includes side D which consists of 7 songs which were NOT on the regular CD release. Those songs are:

D1. Sea Of Simulation
D2. Encom Part 2
D3. Encom Part 1
D4. Round One
D5. Castor
D6. Reflections
D7. Sunrise Prelude
